last_scene: Artie attempted to sell the cursed Participation Trophy to a merchant in Oakhaven to lower his aggro.
The transaction failed because the item is soul-bound, causing a system error that spiked his Aggro Meter to near-maximum.
Artie is now permanently stuck with the trophy and must flee the shop as monsters and guards converge on his location.
key_events: Artie entered Barnaby's Bargains & Blunders to offload the Participation Trophy.
The merchant Barnaby identified the trophy as a massive liability and refused the trade.
Artie used a Data Entry critical success to force the trade, but the System blocked it with a soul-bound error.
The Participation Trophy manifested back in Artie's hand with a shockwave that destroyed the shop's interior.
Artie gained the permanent 'The Eternal Participant' status.
The shop was surrounded by aggro-crazed mobs, forcing Artie to look for a back exit.
